name: Animal Jigsaw Puzzles for Kids
description:
There is no doubt that kids loves animals. They even love going to the zoo and some kids can even identify each of the animals they see. Animal Jigsaw is a perfect game for your animal lover kids. This is very easy to play which is also suitable and enjoyable for the whole family.

Features:
- 12 animal Jigsaw Puzzle
- Three game modes
- Easy to use layout
- Suitable for all ages
- No ads!

Aside from having colorful and bright layout, your kids can also choose three simple game modes to match your child’s ability, (4 pieces, 9 pieces and 12 pieces).

Puzzles include wild animals like lion, tiger, bear, panda, giraffe, rhino and more.

If in case your child find it hard to where a piece should be placed, a helpful hint will be provided by clicking on the magnifying glass.

This easy to play Animal Puzzle game is made for your kids to develop matching, problem solving and fine motor skills. They will enjoy learning with this educational and entertaining game which is perfect for toddlers and preschoolers.
